hicpp-special-member-functions.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
cppcoreguidelines-special-member-functions
.
Checks that special member functions have the correct signature, according to
rule 12.5.7
.
hicpp-special-member-functions.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
